name: Aeronaut (itch)
description:
made for the #gmtkjam in about a day and a half

You are an Aeronaut, sent to "take care" of the nightmare birds clogging up your skies. Be careful though,  your skysuit has a limited amount of juice, and things'll get nasty if you run out.

CONTROLS = mouse to point, left click to shoot, space to go

esc to quit
